article_text:
Wausau Paper Corp. said it disagreed with activist investor Starboard Value L.P.'s move nominating more members to the company's board, saying the additional candidates would give Starboard "disproportionate and inappropriate" representation.

Last week Starboard, Wausau's largest shareholder with a roughly 15% stake, nominated three candidates to the company's nine-member board. Starboard already added four of its nominees...

twitter.title: Wausau Paper 'Disappointed' With Starboard Nominations
